name: Bright Crystal Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Classic Florals.Key Notes:Yuzu Lemon, Peony, Musk.Set Description:This set includes an eau de toilette and a mini eau de toilette. The Bright Crystal scent is inspired by a mixture of Donatella Versace's favorite floral fragrances. It is a fresh, sensual blend of refreshing, chilled yuzu and pomegranate mingled with soothing blossoms of peony, magnolia, and lotus flower, warmed with notes of musk and amber..About the Bottle:The bottle is a unique creation featuring the luxury of clean geometry. Its a design of timeless elegance, an exquisite modern piece of unrivaled beauty..This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (Sd Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene, Carboxaldehyde, Linalool, Citronellol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Geraniol, CL 17200 (D&C Red 33), CL 15985(FD&C Yellow 6).

reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance. Its light and perfect for people who cannot wear strong ones. Love this set. Comes with a travel size too, can take it everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this set last November and use it at least 3 times a week and have barely made a dent into either bottle. This stuff is super long lasting so all you need is one small spritz for the whole day and you're set!  It's also so worth it for the price because you're basically getting the travel size bottle for free. It's a perfect everyday scent: not too overpowering and a really pretty floral and fruity scent!

reviews.review_title: yes little goes a long way
